start.text: Fleet's in danger if we don't win.
Okay, I think we fixed the jury-rigging from last time...

start_boss.text: Keelah! We'll need the whole fleet for that one...

retreat.text: Getting out while we still can!
The survival of the fleet takes priority!
Saving the ship! We live here, you know!

out_of_missiles.text: Bosh'tet! I thought we had more ammunition!

engaged.text: Get ready to patch up, just in case...

need_help.text: Keelah! It's worse than I thought!

running.text: Helm, get us out of there!
Pulling back, that wasn't a good spot...
Oh keelah, get us out of here!

hull_50.text: Damage control is doing its best!

hull_30.text: Second in command's got a punctured suit!
Bosh'tets got us, can't last much longer!

victory.text: Whew, that was a little close.
